```{r plot-setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, 
               cache = TRUE, cache.path = "man/zm-plots-cache/", 
               fig.path = "data/output/plots", fig.align = "center")
```



```{r initial-plots}

# include_graphics("data/output/plots/fake-district-calendar-bcg-month-plot.png")
mtcars %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = carb, y = gear)) +
    geom_point()
```
